snippet: PECK--Norman L. The Juilliard School mourns the passing of Norman L. Peck, a loyal friend to the School, who through his position as president of the Peter Jay Sharp Foundation provided significant resources for our institution's programs and people. A person of great intellect, wit, and vision, he was a very important individual in the world of arts, philanthropy, and real estate in New York City. We send our deepest condolences to his wife, Liliane, and his entire family. Bruce Kovner, Chairman Joseph W. Polisi, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: PECK--Norman L. The Juilliard School mourns the passing of Norman L. A person of great intellect, wit, and vision, he was a very important individual in the world of arts, philanthropy, and real estate in New York City. We send our deepest condolences to his wife, Liliane, and his entire family. Bruce Kovner, Chairman Joseph W. Polisi, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PECK, NORMAN L
